text:
Company: Nelson-Harris

Job Title: UI/UX Lead

About Us:
Nelson-Harris is a leading software development company that values diversity and inclusivity. Our team is strengthened by varied experiences and ideas, and we strive to create a welcoming environment for all employees.

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced UI/UX Lead to join our team. As a UI/UX Lead, you will be responsible for designing intuitive and user-friendly interfaces for our software applications. You will work closely with our development team to ensure seamless integration of design and functionality.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and implement effective design strategies to enhance user experience
- Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs for software applications
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure design consistency and quality
- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in UI/UX design

Qualifications:
- 5+ years of experience in UI/UX design
- Strong portfolio showcasing your design skills and experience
- Proficiency in design tools such as Sketch, Figma, or Adobe XD
- Excellent communication and project management skills
- Fluency in English; effective communication in Luxembourgish is an asset

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
- Flexible working hours and remote work options
